thread.title: BRIEF-Tmx Group Limited Q4 adjusted earnings per share C$1.22

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Tmx Group Limited Q4 adjusted earnings per share C$1.22
text: February 13, 2018 / 5:19 AM / in an hour BRIEF-Tmx Group Limited Q4 adjusted earnings per share C$1.22 Reuters Staff Feb 13 (Reuters) - Tmx Group Ltd: * TMX GROUP LIMITED REPORTS RESULTS FOR FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 * Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE C$1.22 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE C$3.63 * Q4 REVENUE FELL 2 PERCENT TO C$170.9 MILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW C$1.18, REVENUE VIEW C$179.9 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bengaluru Newsroom)
